TextList.OriginalText: What are you doing?
TextList.TranslatedText: ทำอะไรอยู่?

TextList.OriginalText: I need directions.
TextList.TranslatedText: ขอถามทางหน่อย

TextList.OriginalText: Good-bye.
TextList.TranslatedText: ลาก่อน

TextList.OriginalText: Kakariko Village.
TextList.TranslatedText: Kakariko Village.

TextList.OriginalText: Hyrule Castle.
TextList.TranslatedText: Hyrule Castle.

TextList.OriginalText: Great Plateau.
TextList.TranslatedText: Great Plateau.

TextList.OriginalText: What thing?
TextList.TranslatedText: What thing?

TextList.OriginalText: Yeah, good idea.
TextList.TranslatedText: Yeah, good idea.

TextList.OriginalText: Good-bye.
TextList.TranslatedText: Good-bye.

TextList.OriginalText: This one here?
TextList.TranslatedText: This one here?

TextList.OriginalText: Ahhh... I'm exhausted.
TextList.TranslatedText: Ahhh... I'm exhausted.

TextList.OriginalText: Hello?
TextList.TranslatedText: Hello?

TextList.OriginalText: Are you taking a break?
TextList.TranslatedText: Are you taking a break?

TextList.OriginalText:
The Great Plateau? 


Why would you possibly need to go to an
abandoned place like that?
TextList.TranslatedText:
The Great Plateau? 
ทำไมคุณถึงไปที่รกร้างแบบนั้นล่ะ?

TextList.OriginalText:
How would
you even begin to scale that cliff?
TextList.TranslatedText:
How would
you even begin to scale that cliff?

TextList.OriginalText: Well, in any case, it's over there.
TextList.TranslatedText: เอามันเป็นว่า มันอยู่ทางนั้น

TextList.OriginalText:
There are quite a few monsters about,
though. So be careful.
TextList.TranslatedText: แต่ว่าก็มีมอนสเตอร์อยู่บ้างนะ ละตัวด้วย

TextList.OriginalText: See ya.
TextList.TranslatedText: แล้วเจอกัน

TextList.OriginalText:
Let's wish each other good luck,
eh? We'll need it!
TextList.TranslatedText:
มาขอให้เราต่างก็มีโชคกันเถอะ
เราต้องใช้มันแน่!

TextList.OriginalText: Why not kill some time here?
TextList.TranslatedText: ทำไมไม่ฆ่าเวลาที่นี่สักหน่อยล่ะ?

TextList.OriginalText:
Hyrule Castle?!


I don't know how many lives you've got,
but in a place with that many Guardians,
I guarantee you it's not enough!
TextList.TranslatedText:
Hyrule Castle?!
ฉันไม่รู้ว่าคุณมีกี่ชีวิตหรอกนะ
แต่ในที่ซึ่งมี Guardians อยู่เต็มไปหมดอย่างที่นั่นน่ะ
บอกได้เลยว่ามีกี่ชีวิตก็ไม่พอ!

TextList.OriginalText: See that? You can see it in the distance.
TextList.TranslatedText: เห็นนั่นมั้ย? คุณสามารถมองเห็นมันได้จากระยะไกล

TextList.OriginalText:
Honestly, I think you're better off just
looking at it from here.
TextList.TranslatedText:
บอกตามตรง ฉันคิดว่ามันจะดีกว่าถ้าคุณ
แค่มองมันจากที่นี่

TextList.OriginalText: Ah, I see. Kakariko Village is that way.
TextList.TranslatedText: อ้อ Kakariko Village ไปทางนั้น

TextList.OriginalText:
On the other side of the Dueling Peaks,
there's a stable. Stop there and ask
someone for further directions.
TextList.TranslatedText:
ที่อีกด้านหนึ่งของ Dueling Peaks
จะมีที่พักม้าอยู่ ไปถามทางต่อเอาจากที่นั่นนะ

TextList.OriginalText: The end is here...
TextList.TranslatedText: The end is here...

TextList.OriginalText: ♪Hm hm hmmmm...♪
TextList.TranslatedText: ♪Hm hm hmmmm...♪

TextList.OriginalText: Not now. Talk to me where it's dry!
TextList.TranslatedText: อย่าเพิ่ง ไว้ไปคุยกันในที่แห้งๆ!

TextList.OriginalText:
I may be somewhat used to seeing bad
omens by now, but that...
TextList.TranslatedText:
I may be somewhat used to seeing bad
omens by now, but that...

TextList.OriginalText:
Well, let's just
say it's badder than most.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Well, let's just
say it's badder than most.

TextList.OriginalText: We're doomed!
TextList.TranslatedText: We're doomed!

TextList.OriginalText:
I mean, don't panic!
Sorry, who are you? Have we met?

Well, doesn't matter who you are, really.
TextList.TranslatedText:
I mean, don't panic!
Sorry, who are you? Have we met?

Well, doesn't matter who you are, really.

TextList.OriginalText:
I was getting tired of talking to myself,
so you've come at a good time.
By the by, those strange things that
popped out of the ground...
TextList.TranslatedText:
I was getting tired of talking to myself,
so you've come at a good time.
By the by, those strange things that
popped out of the ground...

TextList.OriginalText: Did you see them?
TextList.TranslatedText: Did you see them?

TextList.OriginalText:
I'm not talking about mushrooms here!
I'm talking about those towers!

They seem to have popped up all over
the place!
TextList.TranslatedText:
I'm not talking about mushrooms here!
I'm talking about those towers!

They seem to have popped up all over
the place!

TextList.OriginalText:
And that's not the only strange thing
that's happened.
TextList.TranslatedText:
And that's not the only strange thing
that's happened.

TextList.OriginalText:
Those long-deserted
shrines suddenly started glowing!
TextList.TranslatedText:
Those long-deserted
shrines suddenly started glowing!

TextList.OriginalText: You know what this means, don't you?
TextList.TranslatedText: You know what this means, don't you?

TextList.OriginalText: The end is here!
TextList.TranslatedText: The end is here!

TextList.OriginalText:
With all this craziness happening,
I've been keeping an eye on
that thing.
TextList.TranslatedText:
With all this craziness happening,
I've been keeping an eye on
that thing.

TextList.OriginalText:
Just to see if it suddenly starts moving,
ya know?
TextList.TranslatedText:
Just to see if it suddenly starts moving,
ya know?

TextList.OriginalText: I'm talking about that
TextList.TranslatedText: I'm talking about that

TextList.OriginalText: Guardian
TextList.TranslatedText: Guardian

TextList.OriginalText:
,
of course!
TextList.TranslatedText:
,
of course!

TextList.OriginalText:
Haven't you heard the
old stories about Hyrule?
TextList.TranslatedText:
Haven't you heard the
old stories about Hyrule?

TextList.OriginalText: Yeah, that
TextList.TranslatedText: Yeah, that

TextList.OriginalText: Guardian
TextList.TranslatedText: Guardian

TextList.OriginalText:
is worth watching.
It's just like the ones from those
old stories.
TextList.TranslatedText:
is worth watching.
It's just like the ones from those
old stories.

TextList.OriginalText: See that thing over there?
TextList.TranslatedText: See that thing over there?

TextList.OriginalText:
The one
shaped like an overturned urn?
THAT is what I'm talking about.
TextList.TranslatedText:
The one
shaped like an overturned urn?
THAT is what I'm talking about.

TextList.OriginalText:
Did you know some of them can move?
One of them once chased me down and
tried to kill me!
TextList.TranslatedText:
Did you know some of them can move?
One of them once chased me down and
tried to kill me!

TextList.OriginalText:
No, it was a different one.


That one was closer to the castle but
before the forest...
TextList.TranslatedText:
No, it was a different one.


That one was closer to the castle but
before the forest...

TextList.OriginalText:
When they spot you, they shoot blue
beams of light at you!

Man, I was so sure that was the end
for me. I was prepared for the worst.

But I somehow managed to escape into
the nearby woods.
TextList.TranslatedText:
When they spot you, they shoot blue
beams of light at you!

Man, I was so sure that was the end
for me. I was prepared for the worst.

But I somehow managed to escape into
the nearby woods.

TextList.OriginalText:
You think it was my lightning-fast
reflexes that saved me?

Ha, I wish. Truth is, I just got lucky.


Anyway, I hear Guardians like that still
wander around Hyrule Castle.
TextList.TranslatedText:
You think it was my lightning-fast
reflexes that saved me?

Ha, I wish. Truth is, I just got lucky.


Anyway, I hear Guardians like that still
wander around Hyrule Castle.

TextList.OriginalText:
*siiigh* Just when I find someone to
talk to... I wonder what I did to make
him hate me...
TextList.TranslatedText:
*siiigh* Just when I find someone to
talk to... I wonder what I did to make
him hate me...

TextList.OriginalText: Be careful.
TextList.TranslatedText: Be careful.

TextList.OriginalText: Ask me whatever you want!
TextList.TranslatedText: ถามฉันได้ทุกเรื่องเลย!

TextList.OriginalText:
I'm happy to
chat with you awhile.
TextList.TranslatedText: ฉันยินดีคุยกับคุณ

TextList.OriginalText: Hello?
TextList.TranslatedText: Hello?

TextList.OriginalText:
Are you looking for someone to
chat with too?
TextList.TranslatedText:
Are you looking for someone to
chat with too?

TextList.OriginalText:
Just patrolling. This bridge is an
important route.

I keep really busy making sure monsters
don't nest here by chasing them off the
bridge and stuff.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Just patrolling. This bridge is an
important route.

I keep really busy making sure monsters
don't nest here by chasing them off the
bridge and stuff.

TextList.OriginalText: Where do you want to go?
TextList.TranslatedText: Where do you want to go?

TextList.OriginalText: So... Think the rain will let up soon?
TextList.TranslatedText: So... Think the rain will let up soon?

TextList.OriginalText: Hey! Don't be rash!
TextList.TranslatedText: เอ้! อย่ารีบร้อนสิ!

TextList.OriginalText:
Wait a minute! Please, think about what
you're doing!
TextList.TranslatedText: รอเดี๋ยว! ช่วยคิดให้ดีก่อน!

TextList.OriginalText:
I'm young, but you're even younger.


I'm trying my best out here, but I get the
feeling you're going to end up trying
even harder in this world.
TextList.TranslatedText:
ฉันยังหนุ่ม แต่คุณหนุ่มกว่าอีก
ฉันก็พยายามเต็มที่แล้ว แต่ฉันมีความรู้สึกว่า
นายจะต้องพยายามยิ่งกว่าฉันอีก

TextList.OriginalText:
That's the feeling I get when I look at
your face...
TextList.TranslatedText: มันคือความรู้สึกที่เกิดขึ้นเมื่อมองหน้าคุณ...

TextList.OriginalText: But maybe I'm nuts.
TextList.TranslatedText: แต่บางที่ฉันคงมโนไปเอง

TextList.OriginalText:
You won't change the world by jumping
carelessly to your doom, don't ya know!

That would only do one thing...
TextList.TranslatedText:
You won't change the world by jumping
carelessly to your doom, don't ya know!

That would only do one thing...

TextList.OriginalText: And that's...
TextList.TranslatedText: And that's...

TextList.OriginalText: Drive me batty!
TextList.TranslatedText: Drive me batty!

TextList.OriginalText:
Seriously! Think of the shock I'd suffer,
seeing something like that!
TextList.TranslatedText:
Seriously! Think of the shock I'd suffer,
seeing something like that!

TextList.OriginalText: Now calm down and climb off that rail.
TextList.TranslatedText: Now calm down and climb off that rail.

TextList.OriginalText:
And don't climb down THAT way.
Climb down THIS way!
TextList.TranslatedText:
And don't climb down THAT way.
Climb down THIS way!

TextList.OriginalText: You're fine. Just don't be so careless.
TextList.TranslatedText: You're fine. Just don't be so careless.

TextList.OriginalText:
There are too many enjoyable things in
the world to gamble with your life!
TextList.TranslatedText:
There are too many enjoyable things in
the world to gamble with your life!

TextList.OriginalText:
Man! Don't ever do something like that
again, got it? You almost gave me a
heart attack. Seriously!
TextList.TranslatedText:
Man! Don't ever do something like that
again, got it? You almost gave me a
heart attack. Seriously!

TextList.OriginalText:
Phew! You had me worried there. 
Don't mess with people like that.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Phew! You had me worried there. 
Don't mess with people like that.

TextList.OriginalText:
I'll stay here and chat with you for a bit,
if you'd like.
TextList.TranslatedText:
I'll stay here and chat with you for a bit,
if you'd like.
